entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 04:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
